abstract: The Alibaba Group said on Tuesday that it has closed on the repurchase of a 20 percent stake in itself from Yahoo, taking the first major step toward a long-held goal of regaining full control of its destiny.
snippet: The Alibaba Group said on Tuesday that it has closed on the repurchase of a 20 percent stake in itself from Yahoo, taking the first major step toward a long-held goal of regaining full control of its destiny.

headline.main: In Buyback Deal, Alibaba Gets Half of Yahoo’s Stake
headline.print_headline: In Buyback Deal, Alibaba Gets Half of Yahoo’s Stake

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
